attributes.title: DO NOT GET💅👁💋👁
attributes.review: This app judges people of color and it made me fight my parents😊💅and made me go into a coma 😮 also it makes me pay my friends all my money🥺 AND Tiktok 🥺😢pwease don’t delete it it’s literally my whole life

attributes.title: This app...
attributes.review: I don’t know why it took 5 days to download this app, it’s really slow and now my phone is glitching 😬 I highly recommend it to be deleted, thanks :)

attributes.title: Why
attributes.review: I just can’t. I really don’t understand how someone can look at a group of people so hurt and broken and still attack them.

attributes.title: ☹︎☹︎ 𝚣𝚎𝚛𝚘 𝕤𝕥𝕒𝕣𝕤
attributes.review: As soon as I got the app it glitched and it was taking all the data off my phone and the word part is he ate my pet giraffe and then was a long neck it was not a good Time for me and my family

attributes.title: Trump is not slick ❤️
attributes.review:
I downloaded the app and a dragon came out of my phone and set my house on fire, I gave the app a one star .😡😡Can’t believe this happened! I will for sure be speaking to the manager!!!  
                      -Xoxo a MAD Karen

attributes.title: Horrible App
attributes.review: This app took forever to load and once it did load it put viruses on my phone. Also it tried to force me to vote for Donald Trump even though I’m only 17.

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: My phone started going of at five thirty every day and swiped all my photos and turned the pictures to pictures of Trump

attributes.title: I HATE APPS THAT LIE
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and it caused my phone to seriously glitch. Then it shut down my phone and I was very confused. I was forced to completely erase my phone and restore it. Unbelievable.

attributes.title: APP IS A VIRUS☹️ .
attributes.review: i had to get my phone fixed again as soon as i downloaded the app because it made my entire phone freeze up and wouldn’t unfreeze . this app is terrible DONT MESS YOUR PHONE UP GUYS !

attributes.title: 10/10 DO NOT RECOMMEND
attributes.review: I was just being my racist, homophobic, sexist self when this app started glitching out on me😤 I was just trying to support my pedo king but now my phone it totally broken🙅🏻‍♀️
